column4: BRIEF-Stepan Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.37
column6: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.46 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
column7: * EFFECT OF FOREIGN CURRENCY TRANSLATION POSITIVELY IMPACTED QTRLY NET INCOME BY $0.8 MILLION, OR $0.04 PER DILUTED SHARE, VERSUS PRIOR YEAR
column8: * “HEADWINDS IN OUR NORTH AMERICA POLYMER BUSINESS WILL CONTINUE TO CHALLENGE US IN 2018”
column9: * FOR FULL YEAR, COMPANY EXPECTS CAPITAL SPENDING TO BE BETWEEN $105 MILLION AND $115 MILLION
column10: * HEADWINDS IN NORTH AMERICA POLYMER BUSINESS “WILL CONTINUE TO CHALLENGE US IN 2018” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
